title: Find Us Alive 00: Please Respond
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

+++ SCENE 1

__DISTANT ALARMS BLARING__

__FUMBLING WITH MICROPHONE, SHUFFLING PAPERS__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
MAYDAY! MAYDAY! MAYDAY!
[[/div]]

~~~~
__CLEARER THROUGH MICROPHONE__

[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
[[size 0px]] **HARLEY** [[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
Overwatch Command, come in! This is Site-107, requesting immediate correspondence, over!
[[/div]]

~~~~
__PAUSE__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
[[size 0px]] **HARLEY** [[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
Site-01, respond! Site-107 experiencing… shit! 
[[/div]]

~~~~
__PAPERS SHUFFLE__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
[[size 0px]] **HARLEY** [[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
Shit shit shit- ah! Um, Emergency Code Tango November Lima Six One Six! We are experiencing unprecedented anomalous activity from [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6320 SCP-6320]! EMERGENCY CODE TANGO NOVEMBER LIMA SIX ONE SIX! OVERWATCH COMMAND, RESPOND! OVER!
[[/div]]

~~~~
__FUMBLING WITH MICROPHONE, FRANTIC BUTTON-PRESSING AS STATIC BUILDS__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
[[size 0px]] **HARLEY** [[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
SOMEBODY ANSWER ME! 
[[/div]]

~~~~
__MIC CUTS OUT__

__SILENCE__
@@ @@ 
+++ SCENE 2

__AUDIO CRACKLING__

__THROUGH HEAVY STATIC__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
Calling any and all available Foundation frequencies, come in… this is Site-107, please respond. Overwatch Command, this is Site-107, please respond. We may have experienced a dimensional shift of some sort. We have suffered heavy casualties. Bodycount pending. Status of SCP-6320 unknown. I repeat, heavy casualties. Please respond. Over.
[[/div]]

~~~~
__STATIC FADES IN, OUT__
@@ @@ 
+++ SCENE 3
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
(wearily)
Overwatch Command, this is Dr. Edmund Harley at Site-107. We have determined that Site-107 has experienced a Class M dimensional shift. 53 dead, 34 injured. 17 unaccounted for, may have been outside the building when the shift occurred. There are, um, there are 92 of us alive in here. 82 researchers, 8 D-Class. It has been… uh, 47 hours since the breach. 

Overwatch Command, we can’t open any of the doors.

We’ve lost all apparent communication with the outside world. No cell service, no internet, no… no responses to any radio transmissions. On-Site comms are still working, so are short-range walkies, but other than that, we don’t know if we have any connection to you or any other site. Our entire site is subterranean, so with the elevators broken, too, we have no way out.

Still waiting to hear back about how much food and water we have. And oxygen, for that matter. Backup generator is working, but that has an expiration date on it too.

If anyone is hearing this transmission, please respond. Doesn’t have to be Overwatch Command. Just… anyone.
[[/div]]

~~~~
@@ @@ 
+++ SCENE 4

__STATIC__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
This is Site-107. Come in, Overwatch Command. You’ll never guess what happened today. So, you know how none of the doors will open and none of the elevators to the surface are working? Well, they blew through a wall today. Yeah. Couple bricks of C4 onto the wall out by the entrance lobby. You know what happened? I’ll tell you what happened. More wall.
[[/div]]

~~~~
__HARLEY LAUGHS THINLY, VOICE GROWING A BIT MORE MANIC__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
[[size 0px]] **HARLEY** [[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
They blew up the wall and it just… kept going. Just more drywall and rebar and support beams, like, more copies of the same wall. We had like, four or five of the security officers try and keep digging it. But there’s just more wall! Which is fine. All of this is fine! We’ll make it out of this! We’re the fucking Foundation, what can’t we do, right? The walls to the outside are… infinitely more wall, which is… on par for this kind of work! It’s all been pretty standard stuff, so far, I guess. Trapped with no outside contact in… the void? Maybe? Just another Tuesday for the Foundation!

Wait, it’s Thursday…
[[/div]]

~~~~
@@ @@ 
+++ SCENE 5

__STATIC FADES OUT__

__HARLEY SITS, GIVES A LONG SIGH__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
(speaking low and smooth like a late night jazz radio host)
Good evening, Overwatch Command, this is your late-night DJ, Dr. Edmund Harley. Tonight marks the seventh day we have been in here. Hope you’re all feeling mellow, and if you’re not, just let the silky tones of this radio broadcast bring you to your happy place. 

If you were wondering about the state of that wall we blew up, it… healed. It’s healing. It’s rebuilding itself like a wound.

I have not eaten in three days. 

People are starting to fight over the food. I figured I’d stay out of it. Just seems… easier that way. Everything is going just swell over here at your favorite Site-107, listeners. I have actually barricaded myself into the Communications office on account of the riot happening outside.
[[/div]]

~~~~
__MUFFLED EXPLOSION OUTSIDE THE ROOM__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
[[size 0px]] **HARLEY** [[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
(still jazz DJ voice)
I don’t know if you could hear that, listeners, but it appears the whole staff of our little research operation is a bit on edge. All is not calm at Site-107, it seems, haha. I hope the evening is calm wherever you are. Come to think of it, I’m not certain it’s night at all. It’s always the same amount of dark or fluorescent-lit in here. But what is time, really? Have you ever stopped to think on that, listeners?
[[/div]]

~~~~
__MUFFLED POUNDING ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE DOOR__

__FUMBLING WITH MICROPHONE__

__AGENT LOVE YELLS FROM THE OTHER SIDE OF THE DOOR__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**LOVE**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
Hey! Somebody in there?! You better come out, we’re having a MANDATORY STAFF MEETING! 
[[/div]]

~~~~
__HARLEY SPEAKS IN A HALF-WHISPER, WAY TOO CLOSE TO THE MIC__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
That sounds like Agent Love, out there. Don’t worry, listeners. She can’t hear us underneath the desk.
[[/div]]

~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**LOVE**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
I can hear you muttering in there!
[[/div]]

~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
We’re perfectly camouflaged. You’re all safe with my voice.
[[/div]]

~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**LOVE**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
Why don’t you- Hey! HEY! SIMMONS! 
[[/div]]

~~~~
__LOVE'S VOICE GROWS FAINTER AS SHE LEAVES DOWN THE HALL OUTSIDE__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
[[size 0px]] **LOVE** [[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
SIMMONS! I KNOW YOU TOOK MY MATCHES. BOB AND WEAVE, YOU LITTLE RAT!
[[/div]]

~~~~
__DISTANT GUNFIRE__

__TENSE PAUSE. HARLEY BREATHES INTO THE MIC__

__HARLEY SIGHS CONTENTLY__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
See? As you can tell, Overwatch Command, things are going swimmingly over on our end. Everyone is adjusting to our new life quite well. Answer our broadcasts and we can talk more about it. Doesn’t that sound nice?
[[/div]]

~~~~
@@ @@ 
+++ SCENE 6

__AUDIO FEEDBACK, STATIC__

__PAPERS SHUFFLING, CHAIR DRAGGED NOISILY ACROSS THE FLOOR__

__HARLEY FUMBLES WITH THE MIC__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
(drunk, slurring words)
Come in, oh- sorry. Come in O5’s. Overseer… whatever the fuck. Listen, hi, it’s Harley. You know? From Site-107? Look, I know you’re not listening to me. I know none of you are listening to me. You probably don’t even CARE that we’re GONE. I dunno. But hey, screw those researchers, right? We’re all just EXPENDABLE to you people, right? Right, Overwatch Command? More like Overwatch… DUMBmand… HEH. ...fuck…
Are you bastards doing a funeral for all of us? Huh? You putting a box in the ground at Site-19 for us? I bet you’re not. I bet you’re just using one BIG BOX. For ALL of us. Big mass grave for 107.

Because who CARES, right? It’s the Foundation, “cold but never cruel,” well, you know what I think? I think.... Fuck you. That’s what I think. That’s what Harley thinks! I’m a PERSON! All of us in here, we’re PEOPLE! Except for Dr. Masterson’s parakeets BUT THEY DON’T COUNT. You’re just gonna leave us in here? I bet you’ve heard all of this! I bet you’re hearing every word of this broadcast and you’re all thinking to yourselves, “those poor bastards, sucks to be them, doesn’t it?” And you know what? YEAH. It DOES SUCK.
[[/div]]

~~~~

__STATIC FADES IN, THEN BACK OUT__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
(still drunk)
...I didn’t mean all that. I’m sorry, I’m so sorry… I’m drunk. I stole the only bottle of vodka I could find. Somebody’s gonna shoot me over it… I know they are…

I don’t know what to do. Nobody knows what to do… well, they might, actually, but… I haven’t left the booth in two days so… I dunno.

I miss the sun. 

(leaning away from mic)
Is it too much to ask to get a copy of the sun in here?!

...oh shit. I just realized there are people working here who have kids on the outside.

Oof.

(laughs weakly)
[[/div]]

~~~~
@@ @@ 
+++ SCENE 7
__STATIC FADES IN AND OUT__

__DOOR OPENS__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**LANCASTER**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
Harley? You in here still?

Oh, dammit…
[[/div]]

~~~~
__SHUFFLING AS LANCASTER COLLECTS A VERY DRUNK HARLEY__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
[[size 0px]] **LANCASTER** [[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
C’mon, buddy. Time to get up. Let’s go. You have your own bed, you know.
[[/div]]

~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
(unintelligable grumbling)
[[/div]]

~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**LANCASTER**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
Mm. Yeah, I know.
[[/div]]

~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
(more mumbling)
[[/div]]

~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**LANCASTER**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
Mm-hmm. Yeah, I get ya, loud and clear.
[[/div]]

~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
Lancaster.
[[/div]]

~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**LANCASTER**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
...yes?
[[/div]]

~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
I’m afraid to die.
[[/div]]

~~~~
__PAUSE__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**LANCASTER**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
...me too.
[[/div]]

~~~~
__MORE SHUFFLING__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
[[size 0px]] **LANCASTER** [[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
How do you turn this-
[[/div]]

~~~~
__MIC CLICKS OFF__
@@ @@ 
+++ SCENE 8

__SILENCE__
[[div style="float:left; width: 20%"]]
**HARLEY**
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%"]]
Overwatch Command, this is Site-107, reporting current status.

While we suffered no small amount of property damage, no personnel were injured in the riot... at least not too badly. We're still here. We might have to repair some damaged equipment and hope that some of the walls- um- heal, but nevertheless. Everybody seems to be on the same page about at least one thing.

We are all still here.

We, the 92 survivors of what has now been dubbed Incident 6320-A, are here, and alive, and we have nothing to do.

Except our jobs, that is.

Upper Management had a meeting and decided that the only way out of this is to keep doing what we’re all here to do in the first place: study SCP-6320. See what we can find out. See if any of what we find out can bring us home. Work definitely won’t be going back to normal, per se, but we’re a pocket dimension full of smart people and we’ll figure it out. It’s not like we have a choice to do anything else. 

If the Foundation has taught me anything, it’s that the world is indeed a dark and terrible place full of dark and terrible things. If it wasn’t, the Foundation wouldn’t exist, would it? But I guess, in a manner of speaking, this dark and terrible place, it’s full of us. 

I’m assigned to report the goings-on as things develop, keep a log of everything that happens on site, with the scip and otherwise. So Overwatch Command, if you, by some impossible chance, happen to hear me, we’ll be here, securing, containing and protecting. Like we always do, like we’ve always done.

This has been Dr. Harley at Site-107, over and out. 

And if anyone else is intercepting this broadcast, find us. Preferably, [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/findusalivehub find us alive].
[[/div]]

~~~~

+++ END EPISODE
